title: Benefits of working with us:
item1_body: We work turnkey, as well as with your other contractors. The recruiter manages the vacancy from the moment the application is submitted until the end of the candidate's probationary period. We evaluate candidates based on personal qualities, motivators, professional competencies, and values.
item2_body: Every second or third candidate receives an offer after the technical interview.
item3_body: We find candidates with the required experience and predict their effectiveness, engagement, and long-term fit with the company.
